snippet: The New York City school bus drivers’ strike, which has ended, left exhibitions empty and revenues down at museums and other cultural institutions that usually pack their halls during the week with groups of students.
abstract: New York City school bus drivers’ strike, which has ended, left exhibitions empty and revenues down at museums and other cultural institutions that usually pack their halls during the week with groups of students on field trips.
lead_paragraph: The New York City school bus drivers’ strike, which has ended, left exhibitions empty and revenues down at museums and other cultural institutions that usually pack their halls during the week with groups of students.

headline.seo: New York Bus Strike Put Damper on Field Trip Attractions
headline.main: Bus Strike Put Damper on Field Trip Attractions
headline.print_headline: Bus Strike Put Damper on Field Trip Attractions
